thread.title: Tyrone Terrell
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Tyrone Terrell

author: Tyrone Terrell
title: Tyrone Terrell
text: My wife and I were looking to purchase new mattresses- like many consumers we shopped around. We ended up going to one of GW, competors we went in feeling well- we were asked to lay down take a study,after a long and painful experience we decided to leave that location,not to mention my back was hurting, my wife neck was hurting as well. I remembered we had purchased ALL our furniture from Gardner WHite I decided to go to GW, I can't begin to tell you how sorry I was for not making GW,my First choice, from the time we entered the store we were met with service excellent. There wasn't any pressure our sales man, was nothing but professional he even Made my little 6 year old Tyler feel part of our shopping experience.. We, ended up purchasing new bedding, pain free. I also wanted to purchase the power lift, however circumstances would not allowed me to do so- I would recommend Gardner White to anyone their furniture is absolutely the best when I tell you all my furniture came from GW, they outshine the competition hands down. Thanks GW, I can sleep better tonight thanks to you.
